SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards

Class CardPoints

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards.CardPoints
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConstantPoints, CornerPoints, ItemPoints
public abstract class CardPoints extends Object
The base class for an object ables to calculate the points that a card face gives, when the card is placed on the playing board. The obtained points can be a fixed number, or depend on the items visible on the playing board, or linked corners of the placed card.

  • Method Details

    • calculatePoints

      public abstract int calculatePoints(ItemsProvider items, int linkedCorners)
      Calculates the points gained by the player, when the card face is placed on the playing board. The number of points can be a fixed number, or depend on the items visible on the playing board, or linked corners of the placed card.
      Parameters:
      items - The visible items on the playing board (after the card is placed).
      linkedCorners - The corners linked to the placed card.
      Returns:
      The number of points gained by the player when the cad is placed on the playing board.

    • toString

      public abstract String toString()
      Override of toString method, to print a string representing the points gained by the placement of this card
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
